Processes and how to kill them

15 Jun 2019
process
ps
pid

  • To find the pid of the process, do 
    pidof processname

    or,

    ps aux | grep processname
  • To kill process with pid 
    kill pid
  • To kill stubborn unresponsive process 
      kill -9 pid
  • To kill all processes with name 
    killall processname

    or

    killall -9 processname

Example:

  • Unmounting partitions in use: Find out which process is using it by lsof | grep /mountpoint Then kill it using 
      killall/kill [-9] processname/pid
